|{{HistoryLine||20100206-2034|Wheat crops have an extra, unobtainable item form corresponding to its block ID. It can be obtained via inventory editors with numeric item ID 59.}}
|{{HistoryLine|java beta}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.6|dev=Test Build 3|Wheat crop items can be obtained from the newly added debug chests, mainly from the 1st slot of the 3rd chest from the left, and the 12th slot of the 6th chest from the left.}}
|{{HistoryLine|||dev=release|Debug chests no longer spawn, preventing wheat items from being obtained this way.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.8|dev=Pre-release 2 ;)|Added pick block functionality. This changes the currently selected slot to any containing this otherwise-unobtainable crops item, but does not allow it to be obtained if not already in the hotbar.}}
|{{HistoryLine|java}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.2.5|dev=pre|Crops can now be obtained via Pick Block in creative.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.3.1|dev=12w16a|Crop items can now be obtained in singleplayer worlds via the {{cmd|give}} command using the respective numeric ID.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.7.2|dev=13w37a|The direct item form of wheat crops has been removed from the game. It can no longer exist as an item in any way, only as a placed block.}}
